item.description: This year, the NEBBC is holding a Registered Pre-Walk on Sunday, April 15th to fund the 2nd Annual Bully Parade & Peanut Butter PLUS Drive! This walk will meet at the home of esteemed member, Sarah Juhlin, at 9 Hammond Road, Hopedale, MA and will walk a pre-determined route nearing Milford center. ~~~ Registration fee will be $5. ~~~ All dogs must be leashed and up-to-date on vaccinations. ~~~ Registration at 10:30a, Walk at 11:00a. ~~~ 12:00p is the estimated time to meet back at "Sarah's House" for a potluck lunch! BYOF (Bring Your Own Food) to contribute something yummy! ~~~ As always, we will take this opportunity to collect donations for the local animal shelter, BayPath Humane Society (http://www.baypathhum..., one of the only no-kill shelters in MA that routinely takes pit bulls! We hope to see you there! ~~~ Rain date: Sunday, April 22nd.
item.name: Registered Pre-Walk (to the 2nd Annual Bully Parade!)
